title: Virtual Currency Spent
description: Fired when a player spends virtual currency in a game.

currencyName.description: Name of the virtual currency, e.g. 'coins', 'gems', 'gold'.

itemCategory.description: Category of the item or service purchased.

balance.description: Player's total balance of this currency after spending.

level.description: Player's current level when the currency was spent.

gameMode.description: The game mode in which the currency was spent.
